title: Ping stuck on 50
body: I logged in today to only play on 50 ping. My ping is usually around 30-40. Please riot do something about this. I love this game so much and lagg makes it unenjoyable

replies.body: Can't tell if this is a joke or real problem.
I know it looks sarcastic but there is a major difference in playing with 50 and 30 ping

What, the difference of 0.0000001 miliseconds?

I understand what you mean since i have experienced it myself but you can adapt to the speed.

........ So you aren't joking? You are literally complaining about 50 ping? And asking Riot to fix it? ................................................................................. I play on 150 ping constant...................................... and I ain't complaining.

100ms/ping = .1 seconds.

So if your ping is 10ms higher than usual then it means it's only .01 of a second slower.

Hopefully that puts things into perspective and stops this odd thread.
Please tell me you are joking
